SEARCH
Package org.hms.services.authentication

Class LoginAttemptTracker

java.lang.Object
org.hms.services.authentication.LoginAttemptTracker
public class LoginAttemptTracker extends Object
This class is responsible for tracking login attempts and managing account lockouts. It maintains a count of failed login attempts for each user and locks the account if the number of failed attempts exceeds a configured threshold.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginAttemptTracker

      public LoginAttemptTracker()

  • Method Details

    • recordFailedAttempt

      public void recordFailedAttempt(String userId)
      Records a failed login attempt for the specified user. If the number of failed attempts reaches the defined threshold, the user's account is marked as locked.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user who made the failed login attempt.

    • clearAttempts

      public void clearAttempts(String userId)
      Clears the record of login attempts and lockout time for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user whose attempts are to be cleared.

    • isAccountLocked

      public boolean isAccountLocked(String userId)
      Checks if a user's account is locked due to too many failed login attempts. An account is considered locked if the current time is within the lockout duration since the last failed login attempt that triggered the lockout.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user whose account lock status is being checked.
      Returns:
      true if the user's account is currently locked, false otherwise.

    • getRemainingAttempts

      public int getRemainingAttempts(String userId)
      Retrieves the number of remaining login attempts for a given user before their account is locked.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user whose remaining login attempts are being queried.
      Returns:
      The number of remaining login attempts before the account is locked.

    • getLockoutEndTime

      public LocalDateTime getLockoutEndTime(String userId)
      Retrieves the end time of the lockout period for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user whose lockout end time is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The LocalDateTime representing the end time of the lockout period, or null if the user is not currently locked out.
